markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs=""
>
[Golden-Cased Bullet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1584)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 76</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** round

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The magic-infused metal of this bullet's golden casing allows it to curve just a bit in flight once the bullet has been fired, allowing you to ignore the bonus to AC granted to a target in lesser cover.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Limited"
>
Golden-Cased Bullet (Standard)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 20 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Limited"
>
Golden-Cased Bullet (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 200 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You ignore the bonus to AC granted to a target in standard or lesser cover.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Limited"
>
Golden-Cased Bullet (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You ignore the bonus to AC granted to a target in greater, standard, or lesser cover.
name: Golden-Cased Bullet
